citations.narrative:
The floors of enclosures 1, 3 and 9 have holes that have been chewed in the slatted floors of these outdoor runs. The
kennel floors must be kept in good repair to prevent possible injury to the dogs in these enclosures. Repair or replace
these kennel floors.
Correct by: 10-12-23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
3.6(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The floors of enclosures 1, 3 and 9 have holes that have been chewed in the slatted floors of these outdoor runs. The 
kennel floors must be kept in good repair to prevent possible injury to the dogs in these enclosures. Repair or replace 
these kennel floors. 
 
Correct by: 10-12-23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
